share on x jh j. t. morriss & son funeral home. jun 22 at 7:17 am created a tribute video in memory of mildred q. laine comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jun 22 at 10:24 am peaceful white lilies basket was purchased for the family of mildred q. laine. share on x bm brian mitchelljun 22 at 9:34 am david, randy, mike, and jamie your mom was one of the sweetest, kindest and most giving woman i have ever known. it was such a pleasure growing up around her. she always made you feel so welcome at her home. she was one of those people that after being around her you always felt better about things. she had a way about lifting you up. it was a honor having her in our family. she was loved and will never be forgotten. i know one thing for sure bubber was waiting with open arms for his millie! sorry for your lossrhonda mitchell and family. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jh j. t. morriss & son funeral home. jun 22 at 7:02 am 61 files added to the album life. tributes comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation. jun 22. 6:00 pm - 8:00 pm petersburg chapel103 s. adams street. petersburg, va, us, 23803. get missed the service? send flowers or gifts to the family's home. graveside service. jun 23. 11:00 am southlawn memorial park1911 birdsong road. petersburg, va, us, 23805. get order flowers now for mildred's graveside service tribute video life. tributes wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe facebook twitter j. t. morriss & son funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
